price: Monhwε na moanye obiara anni, gyesε obi a obedi mosom no akyi”. (Nkͻmhyεni), Ka sε: “Nokorε sε, ͻkwan tenenee no deε εne Nyankopͻn kwan tenenee no. (Anaa) sε yεde deε yεde maa mo no sεso ama obi foforɔ nti, anaasε (wͻ’begyina saa Adiysεm no so) abͻ mo kwaadu wͻ mo Wura Nyankopͻn anim nti (na monni Muhammad) akyi)? Ka sε: “Adom no deε Nyankopͻn nsam na εwͻ na Ɔde ma obi a Ɔpε. Onyankopͻn na Ɔwͻ adom a εsoo paa, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ.
arabic: وَلَا تُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِمَن تَبِعَ دِينَكُمۡ قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰٓ أَحَدٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيتُمۡ أَوۡ يُحَآجُّوكُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡۗ قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walā tu'minū illā liman tabiʿa dīnakum qul inna al-hudā hudā al-lahi an yu'tā aḥadun mith'la mā ūtītum aw yuḥājjūkum ʿinda rabbikum qul inna al-faḍla biyadi al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
